e="preserve">Laura Hillman (born Hannelore Wolff; October 16, 1923 – June 4, 2020) was a German-born American survivor of Holocaust concentration camps, including Auschwitz-Birkenau. She was also a "Schindlerjude", who survived the Holocaust with the help of Oskar Schindler.
In 2005, she published a young adult book about her experiences during the Holocaust which is titled "i will plant you a lilac tree – a memoir of a Schindler's list survivor." She was born in Aurich, Ostfriesland, Germany.
Hillman died on June 4, 2020 in Rossmoor, California at the age of 96.
